name: Circumstances
description:
A young photographer on a journey to catch the next perfect shot gets caught up in a weird spiral of circumstances. What should’ve been a relaxing trip to the mountains takes a turn for the dramatic, when she witnesses a tragedy right from the window of a bus mere moments before arriving.

What will become of the otherwise calm village? Will our photographer even remember what she came all this way for? Come find out with us!

Controls:
W, A, S, D - walking
X - talk
E - interaction

Made as an submission for  GDS Gamejam 2020.
